Direct Translation: at the well in the rice field

Lyrics: 小吾子女　たたりらり
Transliteration: ko akome ta ri ra ri
Direct Translation: my little girl child, ta ta ri ra ri,
Poetic Translation: My litle girl, ta li la li,

Direct Translation: my little girl child in the rice field

Transliteration: Markham, Elizabeth. Saibara: Japanese Court Songs of the Heian Period. Vol. 2. Cambridge: Cambridge UP, 1983. Print.
